channel.title: Server status page? Something wrong with it
channel.description:
I guess server advertisment is part of server help. But whenever i advertise my server on the advertisement list, it never goes up!
It only works like 1/10 times, then it gets deleted for some reason! And my server has 100% Uptime!

item.source: Server status page? Something wrong with it

item.title: Server status page? Something wrong with it
item.dc:creator: @Shogunreaper Shogunreaper
item.description:
@Shogunreaper wrote:

Its a pretty big fail, I don’t even know how it works anymore. It seems that it will take down your status by random ammounts.

I had one on there awhile back and it goes down 50% when its been running all day…And i see others that go down by 1% How does it do that lol?

Also, people using websites as there server ip, this needs to be stoped, just because its a no-ip doesn’t mean its their server

You can put the ip:43594 in the web browser and it will come up a blank page, that gives them 100% uptime (You would think so right?) But then again since it takes you down randomly no server can stay up there. (Unless you pay for it…)

Anyway something needs to be redone, i think most people will just move on to runelocus or something, they don’t have those kinds of problems.

Read full topic
item.source: Server status page? Something wrong with it
